Validation.BIDS: This dataset has been validated with terminal-based bids-validator v1.14.14

Validation.anat: Anatomical scans have been defaced with PYdeface and validated with CAT12 in SPM12

Validation.func: Functional scans have been checked for absolute and relative displacement in FSL

Validation.dwi: Diffusion scans have been validated in FSL using QUAD and SQUAD
